generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible tram tracks and lane markings, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A paved sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.

- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver car directly ahead.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the left side of the road, being ridden by a person.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including utility poles and possibly traffic light poles.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- fence: A fence is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
